title: Fmr Governor of Puerto Rico on SCOTUS Decision
itunes:title: Fmr Governor of Puerto Rico on SCOTUS Decision
description:
The former Governor of Puerto Rico, Luis Fortuno, a partner at Steptoe & Johnson, discusses the U.S. Supreme Court decision upholding the oversight board responsible for resolving Puerto Rico’s debt crisis, rejecting a bondholder challenge. June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
